en.title1: Welcome to the World of Comfortable Travel ğŸ–ğŸ»âœ¨
en.title2: An Exceptional Travel Experience Awaits You! âœ¨
en.title3: With You Every Step of the Way! âœ¨
en.description1: Book your journey with ease and convenience
en.description2: Comprehensive services for your comfort on the road
en.description4: No more waiting in lines! Now you can book your ticket in seconds from your phone and set off on your next adventure.
en.description5: From booking to arrival, we take care of every detail to make your journey more comfortable and luxurious. Enjoy our smart and advanced services!
en.description6: Travel with confidence using a booking system that ensures punctuality and complete comfort throughout your journey.
en.EnterTheOTPSentTo: Enter the verification code sent to
en.ContactSupport: If you are having a problem,
en.About: Welcome to our app! We strive to deliver the best services to our users. Our goal is to provide you with an easy and smooth experience while using our app.
en.terms1:
1. **Acceptance of Terms**

By using this application, you agree to abide by the following terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of the terms, please refrain from using the app.
en.terms2:
2. **Ticket Booking**

Tickets can be booked through the app by providing accurate and complete information. All bookings are subject to availability. If a ticket is not available at the selected time, the app will notify you and suggest alternatives.
en.terms3:
3. **Payments and Cancellations**

Payments for tickets will be processed immediately. If you wish to cancel or modify your booking, please refer to the cancellation policy provided by the service provider.
en.terms4:
4. **General Conditions**

The app is not responsible for any delays or issues occurring during the trip. We work with trusted transportation providers, but certain situations such as weather conditions may cause changes.
en.terms5:
5. **Privacy and Protection**

We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your data is kept secure. By using the app, you agree to our privacy policy and how your personal information will be used.
en.terms6:
6. **Modifications**

We reserve the right to change or modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be communicated to users through email or notifications in the app.
en.privacy1:
1. **Data Collection**

We collect personal data to provide a better service. This includes your name, email address, and other details necessary for booking tickets and notifications.
en.privacy2:
2. **Data Usage**

Your data will only be used for the purpose of providing the services within the app. We will not share your data with third parties unless required by law.
en.privacy3:
3. **Security Measures**

We implement strict security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
en.privacy4:
4. **User Control**

You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal data. You can also opt-out of receiving promotional emails at any time.
en.privacy5:
5. **Changes to Privacy Policy**

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated to users through the app and email notifications.
